name: Quick Money
overview: A two-player only versus\duel game created by Ben Campbell and released in 1992 as an Amiga Format #35 (coverdisk 35b), June 1992. Game contains brief instructions on disk and supports PAL/NTSC screenmodes, mouse/joystick control plus a quit back to WB option. It is late within the 21st century. The public imagination is captured by network sponsored duels. Participants fight in arenas, remotely controlling their machines, matching their wits against each other and against preprogrammed droids. Fights are broadcast globally, there is much at stake.
